section.heading: Tax on estates and trusts — Computation.
section.text: The tax shall be computed upon the taxable net income of the estate or trust, and shall be paid by the fiduciary, except as provided in § 47-1809.07 (relating to revocable trusts) and § 47-1809.08 (relating to income for benefit of the grantor).

annotations.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 347, ch. 258, art. I, title IX, § 4
